EmptyRoom.caption: Empty Room
EmptyRoom.entryDescription: You have entered an empty room.
EmptyRoom.description: This is just a boring empty room.

n.description: You see light coming through a door.

s.description: You see a door, but it is very dark

e.description: You hear some music coming down a pretty hallway

w.description: You can't see much down that way, but it smells bad

Topiary.caption: Topiary
Topiary.entryDescription: You have entered a pretty room with plants and light filtering in from above.
Topiary.description: This room has a variety of plants cut to  various animal shapes.  Light filters in through a glass ceiling.  You wonder who takes care of these plants in this empty place.

s.description: A dark tunnel heads off to the south.

DarkRoom.caption: Complete Darkness
DarkRoom.entryDescription: You have entered a completely dark room.
DarkRoom.description: This room is completely dark, you can't see anything save for a small trickle of light coming from the room to the north.

n.description: There is a faint light coming from that direction.

MusicRoom.caption: Music Room
MusicRoom.entryDescription: You have entered a room and there is music playing.
MusicRoom.description: This room is lit by a small ceiling fan that casts great shadows across the walls and the furniture.  In the corner, a music box plays a simple tune as its crank slowly unwinds.  The question is - who winds it?

w.description: There is a doorway to the west leading down a short hallway

SmellyRoom.caption: Office
SmellyRoom.entryDescription: You have entered what appears to be an office.  There is a horrific smell.
SmellyRoom.description: This is a typically configured office.  You look behind the desk and see that the smell is coming from ... a dead body!

e.description: There is a door leading back to the last room.
